name: Grape Wine
author: Jennifer Drury

ingredients.name: Grapes, enough for 5 qt. of juice
lb. sugar, dissolved in hot water

instructions: Mash grapes and let ferment for 3 to 5 days. Draw off juice. Pour juice and sugar into a 5 gallon jug container and add water to fill jug to top. Cover jug opening with sand sack for 3 to 4 months. Draw off and rejug and seal jug with tight-fitting cork or other kind of stopper.
